Description: A unique LC assigned ID for the loan listing.
A unique LC assigned Id for the borrower member.
Indicates whether the loan is an individual application or a joint application with two co-borrowers
Reason: Available at application; might differentiate risk quality

Description: The month which the loan was funded
Reason: Likely not related to borrower’s credit risk

Description: URL for the LC page with listing data.
Reason: Likely not related to borrower’s credit risk

Description: The loan title provided by the borrower
Reason: Likely text variable, to review later

Description: Loan description provided by the borrower
Reason: Likely text variable, to review later

Description: A category provided by the borrower for the loan request.
Reason: Category of loan request, signal for risk.

Description:
publicly available policy_code=1
new products not publicly available policy_code=2
The listed amount of the loan applied for by the borrower. If at some point in time, the credit department reduces the loan amount, then it will be reflected in this value.
LC assigned loan grade
LC assigned loan subgrade
The total amount committed to that loan at that point in time.
Reason: Could reflect LC's decision based on applicant's risk profile

Description: The total amount committed by investors for that loan at that point in time.
The number of payments on the loan. Values are in months and can be either 36 or 60.
The monthly payment owed by the borrower if the loan originates.
Reason: Based on loan amount, term, rate; could be redundant

Description: Interest Rate on the loan
Reason: Assigned by LC, but often used in practice

Description: The initial listing status of the loan. Possible values are – W, F
Reason: Likely not related to borrower’s credit risk, keep for now

Description: The state provided by the borrower in the loan application
Reason: Available at application; to check multicollinearity  with other geo variables

Description: The first 3 numbers of the zip code provided by the borrower in the loan application.
Reason: Available at application; to check multicollinearity  with other geo variables

Description: The annual income provided by the borrower during registration.
Indicates if income was verified by LC, not verified, or if the income source was verified
Indicates if joint income was verified by LC, not verified, or if the income source was verified

A ratio calculated using the borrower’s total monthly debt payments on the total debt obligations, excluding mortgage and the requested LC loan, divided by the borrower’s self-reported monthly income.

A ratio calculated using the co-borrowers' total monthly payments on the total debt obligations, excluding mortgages and the requested LC loan, divided by the co-borrowers' combined self-reported monthly income
Employment length in years. Possible values are between 0 and 10 where 0 means less than one year and 10 means ten or more years.
The job title supplied by the Borrower when applying for the loan.*
Reason: Likely text variable, to review later

Description: The home ownership status provided by the borrower during registration. Our values are: RENT, OWN, MORTGAGE, OTHER.
The combined self-reported annual income provided by the co-borrowers during registration
The most recent month LC pulled credit for this loan
The upper boundary of range the borrower’s FICO belongs to.
The lower boundary of range the borrower’s FICO belongs to.
The last upper boundary of range the borrower’s FICO belongs to pulled.
The last lower boundary of range the borrower’s FICO belongs to pulled.
